sentences.sContent: His grandfather lies in the churchyard.
sentences.sCn: 他祖父葬于教堂的墓地。

sentences.sContent: His grandfather is always carping  about the young.
sentences.sContent_eng: His grandfather is always carping about the young.
sentences.sCn: 他的祖父总是指摘青年人不懂事。

sentences.sContent: His grandfather roamed over the earthquake in Tangshan for a long time.
sentences.sContent_eng: His grandfather roamed over the earthquake in Tangshan for a long time.
sentences.sCn: 他的祖父东拉西扯地谈了半天唐山的地震。

trans.tranOther: the father of your father or mother
